<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Provides a resource which can be used to create a snapshot from an existing DigitalOcean Droplet.

{{% examples %}}
{{% /examples %}}

All [input](#inputs) properties are implicitly available as output properties. Additionally, the DropletSnapshot resource produces the following output properties:

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Min<wbr>Disk<wbr>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The minimum size in gigabytes required for a Droplet to be created based on this snapshot.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The billable size of the Droplet snapshot in gigabytes.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>

    <dt class="property-required" title="Required">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The unique name of the resulting resource.</dd>
    <dt class="property-required" title="Required">
        <span>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The <em>unique</em> provider ID of the resource to lookup.</dd>
    <dt class="property-optional" title="Optional">
        <span>state</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Any extra arguments used during the lookup.</dd>
    <dt class="property-optional" title="Optional">
        <span>opts</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A bag of options that control this resource's behavior.</dd>
</dl>

{{% /choosable %}}

    </dt>
    <dd>The unique name of the resulting resource.</dd>
    <dt class="property-required" title="Optional">
        <span>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>

{{% choosable language csharp %}}

<dl class="resources-properties">
    <dt class="property-required" title="Required">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The unique name of the resulting resource.</dd>
    <dt class="property-required" title="Required">
        <span>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The <em>unique</em> provider ID of the resource to lookup.</dd>
    <dt class="property-optional" title="Optional">
        <span>state</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Any extra arguments used during the lookup.</dd>
    <dt class="property-optional" title="Optional">
        <span>opts</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A bag of options that control this resource's behavior.</dd>
</dl>

{{% /choosable %}}

The following state arguments are supported:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Created<wbr>At</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The date and time the Droplet snapshot was created.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Droplet<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the Droplet from which the snapshot will be taken.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Min<wbr>Disk<wbr>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The minimum size in gigabytes required for a Droplet to be created based on this snapshot.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A name for the Droplet snapshot.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Regions</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A list of DigitalOcean region "slugs" indicating where the droplet snapshot is available.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">double</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The billable size of the Droplet snapshot in gigabytes.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}


{{% choosable language go %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Created<wbr>At</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The date and time the Droplet snapshot was created.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Droplet<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the Droplet from which the snapshot will be taken.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Min<wbr>Disk<wbr>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#integer">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The minimum size in gigabytes required for a Droplet to be created based on this snapshot.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A name for the Droplet snapshot.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Regions</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">[]string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A list of DigitalOcean region "slugs" indicating where the droplet snapshot is available.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://golang.org/pkg/builtin/#number">float64</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The billable size of the Droplet snapshot in gigabytes.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}

<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The date and time the Droplet snapshot was created.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>droplet<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the Droplet from which the snapshot will be taken.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>min<wbr>Disk<wbr>Size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/integer">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The minimum size in gigabytes required for a Droplet to be created based on this snapshot.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/string">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A name for the Droplet snapshot.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>regions</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Region[]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A list of DigitalOcean region "slugs" indicating where the droplet snapshot is available.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/number">number</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The billable size of the Droplet snapshot in gigabytes.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>

<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>created_<wbr>at</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The date and time the Droplet snapshot was created.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>droplet_<wbr>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the Droplet from which the snapshot will be taken.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>min_<wbr>disk_<wbr>size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The minimum size in gigabytes required for a Droplet to be created based on this snapshot.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A name for the Droplet snapshot.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>regions</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List[Region]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A list of DigitalOcean region "slugs" indicating where the droplet snapshot is available.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">float</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The billable size of the Droplet snapshot in gigabytes.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
